content:
Hi everybody. I want to know how can I disable HAPI/FHIR logging in catalina.out Tomcat file.

I have a logback.xml file in WEB-INF directory. I’ve tried removing it but hapi continue logging in catalina.out.
I have managed to disable logging temporarily by removing JAR files "logback-classic" and "logback-core" from directory "hapigeosalud\WEB-INF\lib" but I would like to know how to do it correctly.

I need to disable hapi/fhir logging completly or know how to do it by a config file.

Thanks in advance!

Probably best to ask in the #hapi stream. (There are multiple streams you can sign up for using the little 'gear' icon. Implementers is the default, but can be pretty busy/overwhelming, so some of the HAPI experts only monitor that particular stream.)
